statements: SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT id, value FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 2;
SELECT id, sensor_id, value FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, sensor_id, timestamp, value FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT id, sensor_id, timestamp, Round(value, 2) AS rounded_value FROM SensorData WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY max_value DESC
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id FROM SensorData ORDER BY sensor_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Sensor_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, value FROM Sensor_Data WHERE sensor_id = 3
SELECT value FROM Sensor_Data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM Suspicious_Patterns WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%anomaly%'
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value FROM Sensor_Data
SELECT * FROM Sensor_Data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM Sensor_Data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(value) > 50;
SELECT pattern_description FROM Suspicious_Patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Sensor_Data JOIN Suspicious_Patterns ON Sensor_Data.sensor_id = Suspicious_Patterns.pattern_id;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS data_points FROM Sensor_Data GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY data_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location FROM Sensors
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, data_type FROM Sensors WHERE data_value > 50
SELECT * FROM Devices ORDER BY device_location DESC
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM Devices WHERE active = TRUE
SELECT sensor_name, data_value FROM Sensors WHERE data_type = 'temperature';
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_location FROM Devices WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE anomaly_flag = TRUE ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location, data_type, MAX(data_value) AS max_value FROM Sensors GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(device_id) AS num_devices FROM Devices GROUP BY device_type HAVING num_devices > 5;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, data_type FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE data_value > 100;
SELECT sensor_logs.log_message, sensor_logs.logged_at FROM sensor_logs ORDER BY logged_at DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location, last_updated FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, data_type, last_updated FROM sensors ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location, data_type, last_updated FROM sensors WHERE data_type = 'temperature';
SELECT sensor_name, location, data_type, recorded_at FROM sensors JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id WHERE sensor_id = 2;
SELECT pattern_name, description, created_at FROM suspicious_patterns WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location, data_type FROM sensors WHERE status = true;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE data_value > 100;
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM sensors LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT sensor_name, data_type, location FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT SD.data_id, SD.timestamp, SD.data_value, S.sensor_name FROM sensor_data SD JOIN sensors S ON SD.sensor_id = S.id WHERE SD.data_value > 100 ORDER BY SD.timestamp DESC;
SELECT D.device_name, A.alert_message, A.timestamp FROM devices D JOIN alerts A ON D.device_id = A.device_id WHERE A.timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY A.timestamp ASC;
